longDesc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
detailedDesc: He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy, He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy, chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

longDesc: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.
detailedDesc: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet. It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

longDesc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
detailedDesc: The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little dolls from toy shops at all.

longDesc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
detailedDesc: This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

longDesc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
detailedDesc: She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

longDesc: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.
detailedDesc: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail. It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.

longDesc: A large bird with a broken wing has been cornered here.
detailedDesc: The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it. The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it.

longDesc: A medium sized bobcat is stalking a bird here.
detailedDesc: The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of the bird if you give it the chance.

longDesc: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.
detailedDesc: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life. The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

longDesc: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.
detailedDesc: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat. The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.

longDesc: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.
detailedDesc: It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with you to leave it alone.

longDesc: A furry brown badger is curled up under a log here.
detailedDesc: The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You know that it won't be moving this slow for long.  Its sharp claws and teeth catch your attention when you consider killing it.

longDesc: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.
detailedDesc: This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.

longDesc: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.
detailedDesc: The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.

longDesc: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.
detailedDesc: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal. The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.

longDesc: A grotesque vulture covered in blood and gore is here feeding madly.
detailedDesc: It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to its beak, and unidentifiable organs hang from its talons and feathers.   It sees you and attacks, protecting its horrible feast!

longDesc: A young 5-point buck is drinking from the lake here.
detailedDesc: This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you warily.  His antlers are not full size yet, and will no doubt be quite  impressive in a few years.

longDesc: A fish is swimming about here.
detailedDesc: The fish looks about the right size for a meal. The fish looks about the right size for a meal.

longDesc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
detailedDesc: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball. The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

longDesc: A duck is here, quacking happily.
detailedDesc: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life. The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.
